name: Segment-ML-MultiOutputET-Pred-ROI
command-line: python run.py CYTOMINE_HOST CYTOMINE_PUBLIC_KEY CYTOMINE_PRIVATE_KEY CYTOMINE_ID_PROJECT CYTOMINE_ID_SOFTWARE CYTOMINE_ID_IMAGES CYTOMINE_ID_ROI_TERM CYTOMINE_REVIEWED_ROI CYTOMINE_ZOOM_LEVEL CYTOMINE_TILE_SIZE CYTOMINE_TILE_OVERLAP N_JOBS UNION_ENABLED MIN_ANNOTATION_AREA MAX_ANNOTATION_AREA TILE_FILTER_MIN_STDDEV TILE_FILTER_MAX_MEAN CYTOMINE_ID_JOB PYXIT_PREDICTIONS_PER_PIXEL CYTOMINE_ID_PREDICT_TERM

inputs.name: Cytomine image identifiers
inputs.description: The identifiers of the images to process. If not specified all image of the project will be considered.

inputs.name: Cytomine roi term identifier
inputs.description: Term identifier for the region of interest annotations to consider. Segmentation will only be produced for the areas delineated by these annotations.

inputs.name: Cytomine predict term identifier
inputs.description: Identifier of a term to associate with the annotations of the segmented elements if the trained model was trained in binary. If the parameter is not provided, the uploaded annotations will not be associated a term. In case of multiclass training (i.e. not binary), this parameter is ignored.

inputs.name: Cytomine zoom level
inputs.description: The zoom level for reading the slides (0 for max zoom, 1 or more for smaller magnification)

inputs.name: Cytomine tile size
inputs.description: The size of the square tiles (in pixels). Each processed region will be splitted into a set of tiles that will be processed independently.

inputs.name: Tile overlap
inputs.description: The overlap between tiles to extract (suggested: equal to the pyxit window target dimensions)

inputs.name: Min annotations area
inputs.description: Minimum area (at zoom_level 0) for annotations (in pixels²). Annotations of which the area is smaller are not uploaded to the server (disabled by default).

inputs.name: Max annotations area
inputs.description: Maximum area (at zoom_level 0) for annotations (in pixels²). Annotations of which the area is larger are not uploaded to the server (disabled by default)

inputs.name: Minimum standard deviation for tile filtering
inputs.description: Minimum standard devation to consider for empty tiles filtering (see tile_filter_enabled for more information).

inputs.name: Maximum mean for tile filtering
inputs.description: Maximum mean to consider for empty tiles filtering (see tile_filter_enabled for more information).

inputs.name: Training job identifier
inputs.description: Identifier of the training job. The job should have the trained model attached (as a "model.joblib" attached file) and the properties 'binary', 'classes'.

inputs.name: Number of predictions per pixel
inputs.description: Number of predictions to average to get the label for one pixel. This value does not reflect the actual number of predictions for all pixels, although for most pixels it should be fairly close. The algorithm should be more accurate but slower with higher values. Lower values should have the opposite effect.
